original_text: Then Samuel took Saul and his young man and brought them into the hall and gave them a place at the head of those who had been invited, who were about thirty persons.
korean_text: 사무엘이 사울과 그의 사환을 인도하여 객실로 들어가서 청한 자 중 상석에 앉게 하였는데 객은 삼십 명 가량이었더라

sentences.original_text: Then Samuel took Saul and his young man
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 사무엘이 사울과 그의 젊은이를 데리고

sentences.original_text: and brought them into the hall
and gave them a place at the head of those who had been invited
sentences.korean_translation: 초대받은 사람들 중 윗자리에 그들에게 자리를 주고
